Title: Microsoft Intune: Application Control for Business

Description:
Use Copilot with PDF files for summaries and key insights.
GA date: May CY2025
Title: Microsoft 365 app: Use Copilot in PDFs within the Microsoft 365 Copilot mobile app

Description:
With this update, admins with the appropriate permissions can get tailored recommended thresholds for all the built-in indicators within the policy wizard. This feature enables organizations to fine tune their insider risk policies and get an optimal number of alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: March CY2026
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Recommended thresholds

Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint

Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint

Description:
You can now reference an Excel file when you create a presentation with Copilot within the PowerPoint application.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference an Excel file when creating a presentation with Copilot for PowerPoint

Description:
Viva Glint's Company Admin role currently prevents editing of any role permissions, including feature controls for survey program reporting. While this restriction helps prevent accidental disruption of critical admin capabilities, it has emerged as a significant barrier to Copilot adoption. Customers must create and maintain redundant custom roles solely to enable Copilot access for Company Admin users, adding unnecessary complexity to deployment and ongoing management. This feature update will allow Company Admins to enable Copilot for themselves at the Viva Glint client user role level via a new toggle in General Settings. This enables Copilot across all eligible recurring and ad-hoc survey programs without altering the permissions architecture of the Company Admin role at the program level. All existing Company Admin user role permissions remain locked to preserve critical admin safeguards. This targeted change preserves essential admin role safeguards while removing a key friction point in Copilot deployment.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint admin can enable Copilot for the Company admin user role

Description:
Sync logs in the Viva Learning admin tab with information about assignment and completion-related ingestion errors.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025
Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Learner Record Sync (LRS) logs

Description:
Ability to permanently delete, after appropriate grace period, protection units from the backups. A protection unit is defined as a OneDrive Account, SharePoint site, or Exchange Online shared or user mailbox being protected in the Backup tool.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft 365: Protection unit-level offboarding for Microsoft 365 Backup

Description:
Manage individual Windows quality updates including non-Security and out of band updates. Choose which update types to automatically approve and the rollout options for those approvals.
GA date: February CY2026
Preview date: January CY2026
Title: Microsoft Intune: Windows Quality Update management policies

Description:
The Content Management Assessment (CMA) helps tenant admins quickly evaluate site health, permissions, and lifecycle readiness—all in a single, actionable dashboard. It brings together multiple SAM reports, including Site Lifecycle Management (SLM) and Data Access Governance (DAG), and delivers clear, tailored recommendations to strengthen governance and prepare for Copilot onboarding. How it works: - CMA streamlines a process that was once manual and time-consuming: - CMA automatically runs backend APIs to generate reports such as SLM and DAG. - Results are presented in a clean, easy-to-read dashboard with actionable guidance. Preview highlights: - Clearer, more accessible UI - Refined tooltips and issue categories - Easier navigation across reports Getting started: 1. Open the SharePoint Admin Center. 2. Go to Advanced Management. 3. Select “Start a free content assessment.” 4. Review results and explore tailored recommendations. 5. Share your feedback to help shape future improvements.
GA date: October CY2025
Title: SharePoint: Content Management Assessment (CMA)

Description:
This feature leverages AI to autocomplete the user's formula upon typing the '=' sign. It provides context-based suggestions, streamlining the formula creation process by offering intelligent and relevant completions.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Excel: Formula completion with Copilot in Excel

Description:
We’re making it easier to find what you need. This change will mean that users now see a single, streamlined list of all your conversations. No more switching between tabs or wondering where to look for specific conversations. Just select a conversation and you'll pick up in the same context and mode as where you left off.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Unified Conversations (Chat History) List

Description:
Insider Risk Management is releasing the ability to select multiple Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies as triggering events in a policy. Previously, admins could only select one DLP policy as a triggering event within Insider Risk Management policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Multi selectable DLP policies as an IRM triggering event

Description:
With this feature, we will be providing confidence information in content explorer cmdlet export along with the capability to filter results on the basis of confidence level
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Confidence level filtering in Content Explorer Cmdlet

Description:
Seamlessly onboard to the Places Directory by using a new and improved AI-powered Initialize-Places PowerShell script. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: December CY2025
Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Onboard to the Places Directory with AI

Description:
We are introducing three new Advaned Hunting tables designed to facilitate hunting of Teams messages containing URLs within your organization.

Preview date: April CY2025
Title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Hunting on Teams Messages

Description:
SharePoint site page authors can add SharePoint agents to their pages with an agent web part, allowing end users to easily access and interact with SharePoint agents directly from the site pages.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): SharePoint agent web part

Description:
Viva Pulse users can now assign other users as delegates to create and send pulses on their behalf.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse users can assign other users as delegates

Description:
Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: May CY2025
Title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts

Description:
Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders

Description:
Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced Device Inventory for Windows Devices for Government Cloud (GCCH)

Description:
We are introducing a novel and streamlined method to quickly and accurately remove any unwanted sections from your Clipchamp projects by leveraging the transcript. With transcript-based editing, browsing text, selecting unwanted words, and removing them will remove them from the video without the need to navigate the timeline. We are looking into making video editing more productive by providing a more intuitive and straightforward editing experience.
GA date: March CY2025
Title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Transcript-based editing in Clipchamp

Description:
Enable logging in on a managed Mac using your Entra ID password.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: May CY2024
Title: Microsoft Intune: macOS Platform SSO Support

Description:
This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files at rest in the target library. This simplifies labeling in bulk across document libraries in an organization. This capability also helps protect files as they egress from the original document library, such as for collaboration purposes or attempted exfiltration. Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the online copy of the document. Changes to user permissions on the online copy of the document are reflected on downloaded copy, including full access removal. This provides a more streamlined way to revoke access to documents for individual users, versus revoking access on a per-document basis.
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: November CY2024
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files.

Description:
Communication compliance policies will filter out bulk emails such as newsletters to help customers triage policy matches more efficiently. This will be an option for all policies in Communication Compliance. New policies will have this filtering on by default, but admins will have the option to configure as well as remove the filtering. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to exclude spam and bulk emails

Description:
With this update, Microsoft Purview will start supporting collection policies. Collection policies allow customers to scope classification (SITs - Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users. We recommend reviewing collection policies as they can be created by different Purview solution admins to ensure they are setup to detect the activities required by Insider Risk Management policies Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Collection policies impact on IRM

In the Create experience in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone and iPad, users will see a chat-centered experience to create documents, enabling them to describe the document they want to create in a prompt.  
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat-centered experience for creating new documents in the Microsoft 365 Copilot app on iPhone and iPad

Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile

Description:
Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites

M365 Copilot will be showing the rich and interactive Bing web answer cards like Weather, Stocks etc. to relevant queries to enrich the responses.

Type “=” anywhere on your grid or in the formula bar and let Copilot generate formulas from natural language, making complex calculations simpler and faster.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Generate a formula with Copilot from the grid upon "="

Description:
You can save a meeting as a draft on your calendar if you aren't ready to send the meeting invites. When composing an event with at least one attendee added, select dismiss and then select Save as a Draft. The draft event will show on your calendar as [Draft] along with the title of the event.

Description:
DLP policy tips for Microsoft Outlook for Mac provide real-time notifications to users when their email contains sensitive information that violates organizational policies. Users can see policy tips directly in the mail tip UI and have the option to remove non-compliant recipients or override the policy if necessary. This feature ensures compliance by alerting users to potential data loss risks before sending emails.
GA date: January CY2026
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook for Mac

Description:
Thai Language sentences do not have spaces in between them. And for classification purpose, we relied on right keywords to be added while creating Sensitive Information Type for ensuring accurate match. However, with this feature, spaces will be added automatically in keywords which will ensure higher match accuracy in EndPoint.
GA date: October CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enhanced Classification Support for Thai Language in Endpoint

Description:

GA date: November CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP support classification of Azure RMS protected Office documents

Description:
New VDI solution for Teams introduces multimedia offloading and optimization solution for Microsoft Teams when running in Amazon WorkSpaces (Personal and Pools). Users of the WorkSpaces Client for Windows can enjoy a high-definition experience in virtual desktops, where audio/video/screensharing are offloaded to the user's device and processed by the SlimCore media engine. This entry applies to WorkSpaces only (AppStream is not supported).
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Teams: New VDI solution for Teams optimization in Amazon WorkSpaces

Description:
Organizers and co-organizers can now easily edit the details of Teams Town Hall instances. A direct link to the Teams Town Hall edit page is now accessible from Outlook calendar. This enhancement brings the same seamless editing and registration management experience already available in webinar, bringing a consistent experience across all event types.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Teams: Edit and manage Teams Town Hall instances in Outlook

Description:
This feature enables policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a group. DG expansion refers to the process of expanding Distribution Groups (DG) to ensure all recipients are evaluated for Data Loss Prevention (DLP) rules. This feature allows organizations to evaluate rules based on recipients contained in distribution groups, increasing the confidence that users will receive relevant warnings while drafting emails with sensitive content.
GA date: May CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enable policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a distribution group

Description:
Dynamic watermarking is a sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
GA date: May CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels

Description:
Introducing Data lifecycle management capabilities for Microsoft Planner. Compliance admins can now create a retention policy to manage content located in Microsoft Planner such as tasks for plans associated with an Microsoft 365 Group.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: November CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Apply a retention policy to Microsoft Planner content

Description:
Insider Risk Management will increase policy creation limits from 20 policies per template to 100 maximum overall active policies. For example, an organization may have 50 data leak policy templates because the limit will now apply to all active policies versus each policy template. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Increasing policy template limits for Insider Risk Management

Description:
Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.
GA date: March CY2026
Preview date: January CY2026
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label

Description:
We're updating the SharePoint document library experience to more closely align with the user experience in OneDrive - while making it easier than ever before to access the valuable functionality unique to document libraries. When you’re working in a document library, we’ve brought custom views and filters front and center – just like in OneDrive. We’ve also redesigned the command bar to help you take action, faster. All your view customization tools are now grouped under one simplified menu, making it easy to apply conditional formatting or organize items by metadata in seconds.
GA date: November CY2025
Title: SharePoint: Updated Document Library User Experience

Description:
Save the audio overview that you have generated within a Copilot Notebook to OneDrive so you can download or share with others.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Save an audio overview from Copilot Notebooks to OneDrive

Description:
Copilot Chat helps you stay on top of your inbox by highlighting important and actionable emails such as messages from your manager, leadership, top collaborators, or emails containing tasks when you use prompts like “What’s hot in my inbox?” or “What were the important emails from last week?”
GA date: November CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Catchup on important emails in Copilot Chat

Description:
The Exchange Online Moderation feature gives message moderators the ability to Approve or Reject sending a moderated message to its intended recipients via a special email message form that includes Approve and Reject buttons in the Outlook Desktop or Outlook on the web toolbar. However, the ability to approve or reject a moderated message currently isn't supported on Outlook for iOS, Outlook for Android, or Outlook for Mac. With this update to use Actionable Messages for moderation approval messages, moderators with mailboxes hosted in Exchange Online will now be able to approve or reject moderated messages via all the Microsoft email clients: from Outlook for Windows, Outlook for Mac, Outlook for iOS and Outlook for Android.
GA date: February CY2026
Title: Exchange: Exchange Online Moderation approval requests via Actionable Messages

Description:
Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.
GA date: December CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization

Description:
Documents that have been electronically signed will now be automatically recognized and tagged as “Signed” upon upload to SharePoint. This enhancement also applies retroactively as existing e-signed files will be updated with the appropriate tags. To give users more visibility and control, we’re introducing two optional metadata columns for document libraries: Electronically Signed – Indicates whether a document has been eSigned. Signature Provider – Displays the service used for the eSignature. This feature is available exclusively to tenants with eSignature enabled, helping streamline compliance tracking and document management.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft 365: eSignature Smart Tagging for Electronically Signed Documents

Description:
Users can create Custom Search Folders in Outlook to automatically surface emails that match specific criteria such as sender, subject keywords, categories, date ranges, among others. Search folders update in real time and give you a focused view of the messages that matter most, without moving them from their original location. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: November CY2025

Description:
Authors will have new options when starting surveys, including choosing to send without pre-defining an audience, and feedback can instead be gathered by sharing a link that people can access the survey and respond through, sending a survey without a specified end date, allowing for longer-term data collection and multiple responses from recipients over time, and collecting identified responses, where answers are attributed to the person who submitted them.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - New Pulse customization options

Description:
Allow customers to scope classification (SITs- Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users on devices. Adding DoD/GCC/GCC high expected dates
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: April CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Collection Policies: Scope classifiers and activity to track on all Windows devices

Description:
Microsoft Purview has introduced a new separate role for downloading the original evidence for endpoint. It is applicable when you try to download the evidence using Purview or XDR portal.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Separate role added for downloading the original file evidence for Endpoint

Description:
With the changes in Purview eDiscovery experience, the API support for Premium eDiscovery cases is also undergoing enhancements to align with the UI experience. We have the following APIs in Beta currently which will be moved to Live V1 version and ready for end customer use Search Estimate Statistics Search Export Report Search Export Result Search Add to ReviewSet ReviewSet Export
GA date: June CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Enhanced eDiscovery Premium APIs

Description:
This feature enhances secure collaboration in your organization by using the Information Protection Filer Labeler and Viewer to apply protection from Endpoint DLP. Protected non-Office/PDF files preserve their native file format on-device and can be opened in third party applications. On egress from the machine, these files are protected as PFILEs.

Preview date: April CY2025

Description:
Changes you make to new, draft, or published LPs are now saved automatically in the background. In addition, your updates are now saved in a draft state while editing a published LP until you are ready to publish. The live version stays untouched until you hit publish.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Academy auto-save and drafting functionality

Description:
Users can select an internal or external camera, or keep it turned off, before joining or during Teams meetings.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Teams: Select camera in pre-join and during meeting

Description:
Insider Risk Management will now supply the ability to export policy configuration settings into a CSV. Any user with admin permissions will be able to export the settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

New Pulse series templates are being introduced that are tailored to supporting continuous feedback scenarios for high value use cases such as change management.

Preview date: February CY2025

Description:
Community discussion posts from Viva Engage will surface in Copilot results.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024
Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Engage content surfacing in Copilot results

Description:
Allow customers to bring their own user activity indicators from homegrown, SIEM/UEBA platforms, or other line-of-business applications, and leverage them in existing Insider Risk Management playbooks. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/insider-risk-management?view=o365-worldwide

Preview date: June CY2023

View index browser, schema, and the errors for custom connectors from the M365 Admin center for better troubleshooting.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] View Index browser, schema and errors for Custom Connectors on MAC

Description:
This feature enables policy tips for recipients when emailed as part of a group. DG expansion refers to the process of expanding Distribution Groups (DG) to ensure all recipients are evaluated for Data Loss Prevention (DLP) rules. This feature allows organizations to evaluate rules based on recipients contained in distribution groups, increasing the confidence that users will receive relevant warnings while drafting emails with sensitive content.

The ability to include a Copilot summary when sharing a file now extends beyond Word web to cover PowerPoint (web), Excel (web), PDF, image and text files in OneDrive Web, SharePoint document libraries, and M365 File Viewer. You can even summarize protected or confidential files, preserving your sensitivity labels while getting instant overviews. Description:
Teams Notes and Loop components are now available in Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD environments, enabling real-time collaboration in chats and meetings. Loop components allow users to co-author tables, action items, and lists directly in chats, while Collaborative Notes let meeting attendees co-create and collaborate on their meeting agendas, notes, and action items. As Loop components, these features stay up-to-date across all shared locations, and assigned tasks automatically sync with Microsoft To Do and Planner for seamless task management.

Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search

Description:
When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.

Description:
When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.

Description:
With this update, IRM will start supporting collection policies. Collection policies allow customers to scope classification (SITs - Sensitive Information Types) and activities for scoped users. For device indicators based IRM policy, required collection policies will be automatically created in the background. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Description:
Remotely access devices over the cloud without requiring end user involvement by signing in with credentials.
GA date: January CY2026
Title: Microsoft Intune: Intune Suite - Unattended Remote Help for Windows - Remote Sign-in

Description:
Copilot users will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments in classic Outlook for Windows.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: June CY2025
Title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot in classic Outlook for Windows

Description:
Allows Engage event organizers to answer questions from specific attendees without displaying the reply to the other participants. This capability can be helpful for sensitive questions, personal inquiries, or follow-up discussions that are not intended to be broadcast to the entire audience.
GA date: October CY2025
Title: Microsoft Viva: Organizers reply privately to individuals

Description:
The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail
GA date: August CY2026
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies in Exchange

Description:
Admin controls have been updated for enterprise customers to better manage the new unified video experience, onboarding new admin policies that allows admins to manage video creation and distribution features across platforms.
GA date: June CY2025
Title: Updated Admin Controls

Description:
The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail.
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: February CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies

Description:
When users delete a Loop workspace, owners can restore it from a recycle bin in Loop.
GA date: March CY2026
Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - User accessible recycle bin for Loop workspaces

Description:
View and monitor Loop usage in the tenant through existing M365 admin usage dashboards.
GA date: March CY2026
Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin usage reports for Loop

Description:
Copilot Studio agent builder in Microsoft 365 will support larger file uploads of up to 512 MB.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Larger file upload support in Copilot Studio agent builder

Description:
Managers will be able to export the default sections from the Executive Summary report in Viva Glint directly to editable PowerPoint slides. This enhancement allows for easier and quicker consumption of this report outside Viva Glint, compared to the previous export method which included static screenshots.
GA date: January CY2026
Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Export Executive Summary report in Viva Glint to editable PowerPoint slides

Description:
Microsoft Places will now support Graph API to allow CRUD (Create, read, update and delete) operations on Places directory objects. #MicrosoftPlaces
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Places - Graph API support for directory objects

Description:
New Settings page will give users details on the permissions they have for Shared folders and mailboxes they have added in the new Outlook for Windows and web.
GA date: May CY2025
Title: Outlook: Shared with Me Settings page

Description:
The broader Microsoft 365 Copilot team are working on supporting 6 new languages across all M365 Copilot features. These are (in alphabetical order) Albanian, Filipino, Icelandic, Malay, Maltese, and Serbian (Cyrillic). The planned release of support for Kazakh language is delayed; we will provide updates as they become available
GA date: June CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Language expansion coming in Microsoft 365 Copilot

Description:
When creating a new presentation with Copilot in PowerPoint, choose a template from your organization's collection for on-brand presentations, or select from Microsoft's handpicked templates, ensuring the new presentation is built as per your chosen template.
GA date: May CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easily select a template while you create a new PowerPoint presentation with Copilot

Description:
When creating a new presentation with Copilot in PowerPoint, choose a template from your organization's collection for on-brand presentations, or select from Microsoft's handpicked templates, ensuring the new presentation is built as per your chosen template.
GA date: May CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Easily select a template while you create a new PowerPoint presentation with Copilot

Description:
Creating impactful slides can be challenging and time-consuming. Copilot helps you quickly turn your ideas and files into a fully designed slide with content ready to edit and refine, making the presentation creation and refinement process more personalized and efficient.
GA date: April CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create a PowerPoint slide from a file or prompt

Description:
Now, instantly get suggestions for slide templates to use while creating slides in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide or start typing the slide name or type of slide and see suggestions in the Copilot Suggestions pane.
GA date: April CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Suggestions for slide templates as you work

Description:
Now, instantly get suggestions for slide templates to use while creating slides in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide or start typing the slide name or type of slide and see suggestions in the Copilot Suggestions pane.
GA date: May CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Suggestions for slide templates as you work

Description:
Tasks can now be seen in a grid view in the web version of Microsoft To Do as well as when using To Do in other apps like Microsoft Outlook.
GA date: April CY2024
Title: Microsoft To Do: Grid view for tasks in Microsoft To Do

Description:
We are expanding the access to Diagnostics beyond Global Admin to: Compliance Administrator, Security Administrator and Organization Management
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview Compliance Portal: Expanding access to Diagnostics to Compliance Administrator, Security Administrator and Organization Management

Description:
We’ve made some exciting updates to Viva Amplify's authoring experience that will take your content creation experience to the next level. With our latest release, Copilot is now smarter and more helpful than ever, leveraging your files, like Word documents, and even meeting content, to generate high-quality communications with ease. Here’s what’s new: 1. Smarter prompt tuning We’ve fine-tuned how drafts and rewrites are handled, resulting in clearer, better-formatted output that aligns with your tone and goals. 2. Create content from files and meetings You can now use Word and Excel files, or even meeting recordings, as inputs to help generate content. Whether you're working from a doc, a spreadsheet, or a conversation, Copilot in Amplify helps you turn ideas into polished messaging. 3. Unified content generation flow We’ve migrated to a common service that brings a consistent and scalable experience across all your AI tools in SharePoint and Viva Amplify. What's more, generated content now appears in real-time, making the experience smoother and faster. These updates are part of our continued investment in delivering an intelligent, seamless authoring experience.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Enhancements for smarter authoring

Description:
Efficiently narrow down your search results by using SQL-like commands in the search bar. Users can quickly filter messages, files, or conversations with precise queries such as from:username, with:username or in:channel.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Teams: SQL-like commands in the search bar

Description:
Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs.
GA date: June CY2025
Title: Outlook: Updating Conversation Actions on Outlook for iOS

Description:
Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot Suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.
GA date: April CY2025
Title: PowerPoint: Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide Suggestions.

Description:
Edge Settings is migrating to WebUI2 to boost page responsiveness and introducing a series of minor visual and content upgrades to improve overall usability and utility. This includes optimizing for concise wording of individual settings, simplifying the number of pages and reorganizing content, and creating a cohesive user interface.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Edge: v.139 - Edge Settings Improvements

Description:
Edge for Business will now have a dedicated policy (Microsoft365CopilotChatIconEnabled) to enable and disable Copilot in Edge from showing in the Edge toolbar.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Edge: Introducing a new policy that can enable/disable Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in Edge for Business from showing in the toolbar

Description:
A web form field collection consent toggle will be available in Autofill settings (edge://settings/autofill/personalInfo). This will allow users to consent to Microsoft Edge collecting web form field labels (e.g., "First Name," "Email") to improve Autofill suggestion accuracy. Only field labels are collected and not user-entered data. This new setting is manageable via existing policies in Autofill (e.g., AutofillAddressEnabled, AutofillMLEnabled). AutofillAddressEnabled is the parent setting for AutofillMLEnaled. The AutofillMLEnabled policy is the parent of this new setting, thus turning off the AutofillMLenabled policy will turn off this setting.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Edge: v.139 - New Autofill Personal Information Settings Configuration

Description:
DLP policy tips for Microsoft Outlook for Mac provide real-time notifications to users when their email contains sensitive information that violates organizational policies. Users can see policy tips directly in the mail tip UI and have the option to remove non-compliant recipients or override the policy if necessary. This feature ensures compliance by alerting users to potential data loss risks before sending emails.
GA date: December CY2025
Preview date: October CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Tip Support in Outlook for Mac

Description:
Microsoft Purview Sensitivity Labels in OneNote will allow users to classify and protect OneNote Sections with the same compliance standards available across Microsoft 365 apps. Users will be able to apply labels directly within OneNote, ensuring sensitive content is encrypted, access-controlled, and compliant with the organization's policies.
GA date: January CY2026
Title: OneNote: Microsoft Purview Sensitivity Labels in OneNote

Description:
This feature makes it easy for users to find and access all files within a conversation thread. Instead of scrolling through each message to locate attachments, users can quickly view and manage all files in one place, accessed from the top of the conversation.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Outlook: Browse Conversation Files

Description:
Sign language users will benefit from an enhanced meeting experience. Interpreters will be clearly identified in the participant roster and visually distinguished throughout meetings. Deaf and hard-of-hearing participants who use sign language will be automatically detected and elevated to active speaker status, ensuring equal prominence with spoken audio participants. This will help create a more equitable and collaborative environment for everyone.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Teams: Inclusive meeting enhancements for sign language users

Description:
Enables cloud attachment preservation for users put on infinite hold so that file versions shared are preserved across any OneDrive or SharePoint site. This is a new capability which is different from the existing capability of applying label to cloud attachments and links present in OneDrive and SharePoint and shared in Exchange, Teams, Viva Engage and Copilot
GA date: June CY2026
Preview date: May CY2026
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Attachments preservation for users on hold

Description:
Admins can now use advance mapping options to link AAD and Workday.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for Workday

Description:
Enables you to import indicators from Microsoft Defender for Endpoint related to unapproved or malicious software installation or bypassing security controls. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.

GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2022
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts

Description:
Quickly get back to important information without scrolling through long conversations. You can save messages, whether it is a post, a reply or chat message, and find them later in the Saved view in your Chat or Teams list. Click on a saved message to open the full conversation in the right pane, where you can review or reply directly.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Teams: Saved messages

Description:
Admins can access the new Message Trace and its capabilities by default when navigating to the Exchange admin center > Mail flow > Message Trace. Admins can also leverage the new Message Trace PowerShell cmdlets Get-MessageTraceV2 and Get-MessageTraceDetailV2. We have added key improvements such as support to query up to 90 days of historical data for message trace summary report (near real-time query), subject search capability, and more.

Description:
If an organizer updates an event that you have been invited to, you will now see Event Updated in the email and the updated location if applicable.

Title: Outlook: Event Updates

Description:
OneDrive for Web now lets you add text or images as watermarks to your PDF documents. You can place the watermark in front of your content and choose the perfect location and angle for it.

Title: SharePoint: OneDrive and SharePoint -  Apply watermark to PDF

Once you integrate your organization's assets into a Sharepoint OAL (Organization Asset Library) you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot

Once you connect your asset library, hosted with Templafy, to Microsoft 365 and Copilot, you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses Enterprise assets hosted on Templafy when creating presentations with Copilot

Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.
GA date: July CY2025
Preview date: December CY2024
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report

Description:
Perform file-level browse/search and then restore using Microsoft 365 Backup. With this enhancement you will be able to browse for files across in a site from available daily restore points and apply filters to narrow results, restore at the original location by overwriting existing content or to a new place by creating a copy of the content.

Preview date: November CY2025

Description:
We are expanding the file types supported in Copilot Chat to align with the Microsoft Search experience.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat now supports more file types in search grounding.

Description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat is available at no additional cost for Microsoft 365 EDU users ages 13 and older who sign in with their Microsoft Entra account (no Microsoft 365 Copilot license required). Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat offers enterprise data protection (EDP), and secure AI chat, powered by the latest large language models with optional web grounding. Admins must take action to enable access.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat for EDU customers ages 13 and older

Description:
In this update, we are adding two new email indicators to Insider Risk Management. 1. Sending email with attachments to free public domains - This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. 2. Sending email with attachments to self - This alerts when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to user's personal email account or emailing self, potentially leading to a data security incident. Admins with appropriate permissions can enable these indicators from the settings page and use these new indicators in the data leaks or data theft policy template. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Description:

This empowers reviewers by providing context on the user's history, enabling them to address violations with a complete view of all other potential risky interactions that may result in a data security or compliance incident. As a result, reviewers can make informed decisions, streamlining the review process to be both efficient and effective.

Description:
When investigating alerts within Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management, you can now harness the power of Microsoft Copilot for Security. This tool not only provides concise alert summaries, but it also allows you to delve into specific user activities. By doing so, you can promptly assess whether the user associated with the alert warrants further investigation or if the alert can be safely dismissed. Additionally, with just a click, you can obtain a succinct summary of the user’s risk profile, highlighting crucial details and top risk factors. Leveraging Copilot for Security streamlines investigations, ultimately reducing the triage workload and enabling faster decision making.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: August CY2024

The sensitivity analysis is presented as a bar chart, with potential inputs of an indicator threshold on the x-axis and the corresponding count of users on the y-axis. Admins can utilize this chart to make informed decisions on which threshold to apply for each indicator. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Description:
We’re adding support for property deletion in custom Copilot connectors, giving admins and developers more control over schema evolution. With this feature, you can: * Use Copilot connector APIs to delete or drop individual schema properties that are no longer needed. * Keep your connector schema clean and up-to-date without requiring full re-ingestion. * Reduce developer overhead and simplify maintenance workflows as your data models evolve.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Delete Schema Properties via Copilot Connector APIs

Description:
We’re introducing new options that allow admins and developers to enrich their custom Copilot connectors and its schema properties with descriptive metadata. With this update, you can now: * Provide richer context about the connection and its schema properties to Copilot’s LLM, enabling more accurate and relevant responses. Add alternate names, data source categories, common actions to your connector and description for schema properties. * Improve search and chat quality by helping Copilot better understand the semantics and purpose of your data.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Connector Metadata Enrichment for Custom Copilot Connectors

Description:
This feature enables connectors to resolve external identities—such as email addresses or user IDs from third-party data sources—to their corresponding Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD) identities. By allowing flexible identity mapping, developers can: * Simplify integration workflows without needing complex Graph API lookups. * Reduce setup friction by avoiding strict dependency on object IDs. * Improve search and chat relevance in Copilot by ensuring accurate people attribution across connected systems.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Simplified People Resolution for Custom Copilot Connectors

Description:
Accelerate your custom connector development with intelligent schema guidance directly in the Microsoft 365 Admin Center. This feature provides: * Proposed schema suggestions tailored to the connector you’re building. * Real-time recommendations to identify gaps or errors in your schema design to help improve search and chat results in Copilot. Whether you're starting from scratch or refining an existing connector, this enhancement ensures your schema is optimized for Copilot extensibility and performance.
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Schema Recommendations for Custom Connectors in M365 Admin Center

Description:
We are introducing a new set of enhancements to the modernized eDiscovery user interface aimed at improving both functionality and user experience. These updates include the ability to delete searches and direct exports; bulk add data sources and populate the custodian field for items in review sets and exports. We are also rolling out a tenant-level premium feature toggle to provide greater administrative control. Additionally, users will benefit from a new analytics process report and improvements to the search condition builder, which now supports logical operators such as AND, OR, and NEAR for more precise and flexible keyword queries, along with country and language selection for the query. The ability to configure the maximum export package size, with an updated default value to better support large-scale exports is also included.

Description:
Users have long been able to use personal Microsoft accounts with the OneDrive app on corporate Windows devices—unless restricted by admin policy. This new feature introduces a prompt only when a personal account is already signed in on the device, encouraging users to also sign in to the OneDrive app with that account. Administrators who have already restricted personal accounts on corporate devices can continue to manage this as before. Organizations that have already disabled personal OneDrive accounts on corporate devices with the DisablePersonalSync policy will not see this prompt. Administrators can also suppress it using the DisableNewAccountDetection policy. More information on configuring policies can be found here:
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sharepoint/use-group-policy#manage-onedrive-using-group-policy

Description:
Named entities are sensitive information types (SITs) that can’t easily be identified by a regular expression or a function; these include person names, physical addresses, and medical terms and conditions. This update expands name and address coverage to an additional 7 countries, such as China and Russia, and expands medical terms and conditions (specifically for the Diseases SIT) to an additional 29 languages covering much of Europe, China, Japan, and Korea.

GA date: February CY2025

Description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on activities that may lead to a data security incident in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2026
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management

Description:
Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, Google Drive, and GitHub. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2026
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Support for multicloud environments

Description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk-detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on user activities in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: April CY2024
Title: Microsoft Purview: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management

Description:
Microsoft Purview Information Protection extends its sensitivity labels and protection policies into data contained in Azure SQL, Azure Data Lake Storage, and Amazon S3. Organizations can create label-based protection policies that specify which data sources, databases, or storage buckets are in scope, and which users or groups are allowed to access data with a certain sensitivity label and Purview will automatically enforce the policy and block unauthorized access to sensitive data. Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, and Google Drive. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Note: We have updated the cloud environments to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2024
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Information Protection and Insider Risk Management support multicloud environments

Pull Print enables IT Pros to offer their end users a simplified view of the print solution. Specifically, IT Pros can set up virtualized printer(s) so that end users only need to know the name of one printer. Those users can securely release their own print jobs at any associated printer, depending on the setup.

Preview date: November CY2024

Description:
Users of the Microsoft Authenticator app on iOS will be able to back up account names—including Microsoft work or school accounts, Microsoft personal accounts, and third-party accounts like Amazon or Google—using iCloud and iCloud Keychain. This enables secure, end-to-end encrypted backup of account names and TOTP credentials. When setting up a new iOS device, account names will automatically appear in the app, and users can sign in to complete setup.
GA date: August CY2025
Preview date: September CY2025

Description:
SharePoint is updating the capabilities of its text editor Copilot. Now, you can not only use copilot to rewrite your existing text but also use it to keep writing or add a grounding document. By answering the question "what do you want copilot to change", you can perform any number of refinements to your existing content.
GA date: July CY2025

Description:
Introducing enhancements to live captions and live transcripts in Microsoft Teams to make meetings more intuitive, accessible, and privacy-focused. Live captions are now scrollable, allowing users to review past conversation with more flexibility and over a larger surface area. Next, copying captions is disabled by default to protect sensitive information and support compliance. Additionally, the live transcript panel won’t open automatically with features that trigger transcription—like recording, giving users greater control over their layout. Lastly, If transcription is enabled, users who attempt to open the live transcript panel will see a banner suggesting they switch to live captions for real-time comprehension. These updates streamline the experience while supporting accessibility and privacy.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Microsoft Teams: Usability and privacy improvements for live captions and live transcript in meetings

Description:
In this update, we are making the below enhancements to IRM exclusions to reduce alert noise. 1. Keyword logic update for email - An email will be excluded from scoring only when all the attachments match the keyword exclusions or email subject matches the keyword exclusions. This will be helpful to reduce the email signature noise which commonly contains keyword "image". 2. Keyword exclusions on both target and source file paths - For signals like file copied to removable media, keyword exclusions apply on both target and source file paths. 3. File path exclusions for removable media - We will start supporting file path exclusions for removable media. 4. Exclusion support for browser - Domain exclusions are now supported for browsing indicators. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
GA date: June CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Enhancements to global exclusions in IRM settings

More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365-apps/outlook/get-started/virtualized-desktop-infrastructure

Description:
With so many of us in back-to-back meetings, it can be a real struggle to stay on top of pre-reads, action items, and even what each meeting is about. Copilot can identify and summarize the key points so you can show up prepared in just a few minutes. When you have an upcoming meeting, Copilot proactively shows you a "Prepare" button in your inbox which helps you quickly get context by creating a summary of the meeting and showing and summarizing relevant files, leveraging the power of the Microsoft Graph. Now you have all the most important details you need and can arrive prepared and ready to engage in a productive conversation. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025
Title: Outlook: Copilot Prepare for Meeting in Calendar

This enhances the experience for users by enabling clear speaker labels and richer in-meeting and post-meeting insights with Microsoft 365 Copilot. Users just enroll profiles via Teams Settings to be recognized.

Description:

GA date: December CY2024
Title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Unified video branded start page

Description:
Optical character recognition (OCR) scanning enables Microsoft Purview to scan images for sensitive information. With Embedded support, OCR will scan content in DOCX, PPTX, XLSX and PDFs (scanned and hybrid containing searchable text and images). This will be in addition to support for standalone images
GA date: September CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Optical character recognition (OCR) - Support for embedded images in files including Office files in SharePoint and OneDrive

Description:
Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI support for Fabric Copilot and Security Copilot.
GA date: June CY2025
Preview date: March CY2025
Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI- additional Microsoft Copilot integrations
